transcript: so let me tell you where the next trillion dollar companies are coming from so think about chat GPT et cetera as kind of the engine or the platform of the internet all of these companies were built on top of that base layer and so the AI that starts to figure out how to diagnose medical conditions faster better cheaper than Physicians can trillion dollar business the people who can gather all of the data of all of the sales calls and then feed them into their AI we'll have a consistent sustained competitive Advantage because they will always have more information than the guy who starts later than them and so the idea is you want to start that data flywheel as fast as you can so that you can build that mode that makes your sales AI better than anyone else's and that is where huge amounts of economic value are going to be created in this short to medium term
